analysis.description:
WrapperLock.balances (/unique_chucks/31/0x328b6e9d6dc8908a860623a037f80ec5f501f4dc.sol#183-184) shadows:
	- BasicToken.balances (/unique_chucks/31/0x328b6e9d6dc8908a860623a037f80ec5f501f4dc.sol#24-26)

BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/31/0x328b6e9d6dc8908a860623a037f80ec5f501f4dc.sol#28-29) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/31/0x328b6e9d6dc8908a860623a037f80ec5f501f4dc.sol#31-36)

WrapperLock (/unique_chucks/31/0x328b6e9d6dc8908a860623a037f80ec5f501f4dc.sol#174-273) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/31/0x328b6e9d6dc8908a860623a037f80ec5f501f4dc.sol#232-242)

	- require(bool)(ERC20(originalToken).transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_value)) (/unique_chucks/31/0x328b6e9d6dc8908a860623a037f80ec5f501f4dc.sol#196-201)
